content:
## 2024-08-19 Daily Operations Summary

- Active: 68
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 47
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 14

#### By Cohort
- 10mg: 19
- 25mg: 20
- 50mg: 21
- 100mg: 22

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-2547, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 100mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2521, Description: peripheral edema, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-2540, Description: Dose adjustment documentation incomplete, Severity: minor
- PD ID: RB-PD-2537, Description: Blood pressure measurement not recorded at visit, Severity: minor

### Events
- Protocol training refresher completed for site coordinators
- Bioanalytical lab shipment: 42 frozen urine aliquots dispatched
- DSMB safety data snapshot prepared

### Notes
- Week 25: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 82 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
